message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration, I believe it's only fair to extend this offer considering its significance and your potential appreciation for it. I am proposing to sell the product to you for $1,350,000. This price reflects a balance between acknowledging the product's worth to me and providing you with a reasonable opportunity to own something that could be incredibly valuable to you. I trust that this offer will be favorable to both parties and look forward to discussing the details further.
